result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Linton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury, Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Court orders the $150 cash bond on file be applied to the fine and court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.

1.  Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.
2.  Court will grant expungement after one year.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Linton
Current: W1837 Lakeview Rd, Markesan, WI 53946 United States  (Effective: 09-29-2015)
Prior: W1015 Brooklyn J, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States
JOC has been returned.  Return to sender.  Re-sent to:  W1827 Lakeview Rd  Markesan, WI  53946-8613
Settlement Form (PTC)

10:21 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant, will not be getting an attorney.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court recites agreement - upon plea to charge in 2015CM154, 2015CM155 will be dismissed.  State concurs.  Defendant concurs.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation.

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on count 1 on 2015CM154.  Court orders 2015CM155 be dismissed.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to: 

$150 fine plus court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
Court will grant expungement after one year.
Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court orders the $150 cash bond on file in 2015CM154 be applied to the fine and court costs.


Court adjourned at 10:28 a.m.

Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant stands mute.  Court enters a plea of NOT GUILTY on behalf of the defendant.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  DA makes bond recommendation. Court will set for Status Hearing on September 8, 2015 at 10:00 a.m.  Defendant to make an appt with the DA's office.
